document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0bcd4">fairest </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a874ff">Home </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">ever </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7078ff">knew </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Was </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0bcd4">founded </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">in </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">an </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0bcd4">Hour </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">By </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0bcd4">Parties </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">also </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7078ff">knew </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">A </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c478ff">spider </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">and </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a060c4">Flower </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">A </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c478ff">manse </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a874ff">mechlin </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">and </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7078ff">Floss </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: The fairest home I ever knew
